A little bit out of sync....

I didn't notice the sync issues on this like I have on a couple of other versions...

I converted/burned it on ConvertX4 and it came out with perfect sync.

ok so i just looked at it unconverted on VLC and it is  a bit off - hastening to -0.2 corrects it.

i guess if it had been perfect it would have been off when i burned it...
use avisynth to fix audio...0.22 will synch
What a great movie. A must see. a-10/v-10

V - 8

Movie plays fine, all in sync. 
Movie itself is utter crap and Cooper is old enough to be Lawrence's dad so that's some creepy shit, but whatever. Your wife/GF probably wants to see this, so earn some brownie points and get it.
